text: David Pandian (25 September 1932 â€“ 26 February 2021) was an Indian Communist politician. He was born in Usilampatti, Tamil Nadu. From 1989 to 1996, he was a member of the Lok Sabha. Pandian died on 26 February 2021 in Chennai, Tamil Nadu from sepsis-related problems, aged 88.Veteran CPI leader D.
